name: Lonely Meteor
description:
The first game I finished. I made it for the Major jam : Isolation.

You play as an asteroid in quest of a planet to bring the necessery materials for future life.

You can zoom in and out, try surviving to star's and planet's gravity by moving using your propulsor using WASD. But they can't be used all the time else they overheat so they have a cooldown.

This game coded by FerVst and assets made by BeryStudio.
